definition: to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes

sentences.english: It is an offense to litter handbills.
sentences.chinese: 請勿亂丟宣傳單張，違者必究。

sentences.english: Relevant leaflets can be obtained free of charge in the following schools or housing estates at the end of each month.
sentences.chinese: 有關單張將於當月底在下列屋苑或學校免費派發。

sentences.english: The simplest, repeating designs could fit on a single card.
sentences.chinese: 最簡單的重複性設計可由單張卡片完成。

sentences.english: Sheet-fed front edge suction for various sheet size.
sentences.chinese: 單張式前緣自動送紙，適用多樣紙張尺寸。

sentences.english: Please refer to reverse side for more offer details.
sentences.chinese: 請翻閱此單張背頁，查閱更多優惠詳情。

sentences.english: Sheet-feed front edge suction for various sheet size.
sentences.chinese: 單張式前緣自動送紙，適用多樣式紙張尺寸。

sentences.english: Detailed directions for use can be found on the in-pack leaflet.
sentences.chinese: 詳細的使用方向上可以找到在包裝單張。

sentences.english: A double-sided rubber block is arranged on each of the four corners of the single tablecloth.
sentences.chinese: 單張桌布的四個角上設有雙面膠塊。

sentences.english: Packaging material for the finished product including a Vietnamese language insert leaflet.
sentences.chinese: 包裝成品包括越南語插入單張材料。

sentences.english: Don't have too many images on any single slide.
sentences.chinese: 任何單張幻燈片上不要放太多圖片。

sentences.english: The SFC takes no responsibility as to the contents of this Term Sheet.
sentences.chinese: 證監會對本條款單張所載容概不負責。

definition: summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report/also written 匯總|汇总
identity card/also written 身份證|身份证[shen1 fen4 zheng4]
receipt (written acknowledgement of receipt of an item)
